basics.name: Yiou Chen
basics.label: Frontend engineer
basics.summary: Frontend engineer at Veeva Systems UIPlatform. Manga and anime lover.

work.summary: I work in the UIPlatform team. Our objective is to improve the foundation of our enterprise applications using the latest technologies and best practices. Some of the technologies we use every day includes React, Redux, Webpack, Sass. Jest, Enzyme, etc.
highlights: Rebuilt login page using React and Redux
Standardized the front-end routing system for our single page app
Built an Excel-like data grid component with React

work.summary: I worked in a small fast-paced team that does prototyping for clients. We experimented with various technologies and turned clients' idea into reality. As one of the frontend engineers in the team, I have experienced with Angular, React, Polymer, D3 and so on.
highlights: Developed customizable data visualization components using D3.js and Angular 2
Maintained the Angular UI component library
Created and integrated a map widget that handled high-volume real-time data using leaflet

education.summary: I majored in Computer Science, minored in Digital art. In college, I studied various topics in computer science, including database design, system programming, network programming, computer graphics, etc. I graduated from the Computer Science Honor Program with Summa Cum Laude designation.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.usage: As a frontend engineer, I use JavaScript in my daily work. It is my most comfortable language.

skills.name: HTML
skills.usage: I am very comfortable with HTML. I contributed to component libraries in my internship and my current job. We hold a very high standard on the component semantics and accessibility.

skills.name: CSS
skills.usage: I am confident with my CSS skill. While building React components at Veeva Systems, I need to make sure pixel perfect presentation according to the design document.

skills.name: React
skills.usage: I use React in my current job. We are building a React component library. I worked on two complicated component, select and data grid.

skills.name: Angular
skills.usage: I use Angular 2 in my previous internship in which I develop a series of customizable data visualization (barchart, linechart, piechart) using Angular and D3

skills.name: Vue
skills.usage: I build my previous personal website using Vue

skills.name: Java
skills.usage: Java was the introductory language in my college. I used it for school projects. I also need to deal with some Java in my current job when I work in backend.

skills.name: C#
skills.usage: I used C# for Unity game programming for my Game Programming specialization in College. I built two complete games with Unity.
